front.title: IEEE Draft Standard AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis - Preferred Ratings and Related Required Capabilities for Voltages above 1000 Volts.

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard describes the preferred ratings of indoor and outdoor high-voltage circuit breakers rated above 1000 V for use in commercial, industrial, and utility installations.
